Game.Title: NBA 2K 20
Game.Description:
NBA 2K has evolved into much more than a basketball simulation. 2K continues to redefine what’s possible in sports gaming with NBA 2K20, featuring best in class graphics and gameplay, ground breaking game modes, and unparalleled player control and customization. Plus, with its immersive open-world Neighborhood, NBA 2K20 is a platform for gamers and ballers to come together and create what’s next in basketball culture.
In-game purchases optional
1-4 players Network Players 2-10 - Full game requires PlayStation®Plus membership to access online multiplayer 60GB minimum save size DUALSHOCK®4 Vibration Function Remote Play Supported HD Video Output 720p,1080i,1080p
